oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Snow Interview for WTCW: Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This recording features backstage interviews from the Grand Ole Opry with Hank Snow and guests. Guests include: Justin Tubb, June Carter, Del Wood, Porter Wagoner, Chester Atkins, and Little Jimmy Dickens. Hank asks each guest where they have been on tour, where they will be going on tour next, and what new music they have released as well as offer them the opportunity to say something to the listeners. After each interview, the guests congratulates Hank Snow on 20 years with RCA Vector and also congratulate Snow and Ernest Tubb on their two radio station programs for WTCW in Whitesburg, Kentucky and WHBT in Harriman, Tennessee. The guests also record snapshots announcing the different radio stations. The tape is undated. This tape is forty of an unidentified number of tapes. This tape is forty of an unidentified number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Justin Tubb; June Carter; Del Wood; Porter Wagoner; Chester Atkins; Little Jimmy Dickens; Ernest Tubb
